text: Ferdinand Alexander "Ferry" Hoogendijk (23 November 1933 - 14 February 2014) was a Dutch political scientist, journalist and politician. He was the editor of Elsevier and a member of the parliamentary group of the Pim Fortuyn List (, LPF). He was born in Gouda, South Holland. Hoogendijk died on 14 February 2014 in Naarden, North Holland. He was 80 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1933 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Dutch journalists Category:Members of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands Category:People from Gouda Category:Pim Fortuyn List politicians Category:Dutch political scientists Category:Politicians from South Holland Category:Writers from South Holland
title: Ferry Hoogendijk
